name: Feraligatr
author: Anesaki Dynamic
flavor_text: When it bites with its massive and powerful jaws, it shakes its head and savagely tears its victim up.

abilities.name: Rowdy
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you must flip a coin. If heads, discard the top 5 cards of your opponent’s deck. If tails, discard the top 5 cards of your deck.

attacks.name: Crunch
attacks.effect: Discard an Energy from your opponent’s Active Pokémon.
